extendedInfo.description: UPDATE: Support for multiple independent and configurable widgets has been added. Now you can have as many Daisypath Widgets as you want, all with a unique ticker listing.Create daily updating tickers to celebrate the milestones in your life using a beautiful range of hand-drawn images. Tickers can be displayed on your home screen or published online.The App installs with the minimum of images to keep the initial download small. Once installed you can download lots more images in FREE ticker packages tailored to suit you.Daisypath tickers can be used for:Anniversary -- display how long you have been together or count to your next Anniversary.Birthday -- Keep track of whose birthday is up next or how old they are.Friendship -- Show how long you have been friends.Travel -- Display how long until your next holiday, or how long you have been away.Event -- Count to or from a special date like your Graduation.Holiday -- Count down to special holiday dates like Christmas, Easter, Valentines Day, Thanksgiving and Halloween.On the home screen widget you can see which event is coming up next, and click to refresh and cycle through your tickers. When you are online, tickers can be published to Facebook, Google+, Hyves and many websites, blogs, email and forum signatures.Installing the app gives you free access to a library of ticker packages with lots more hand drawn images to choose from when you create your tickers. Free ticker packages currently include: pack1 - Sliders: Friends and Couples -- For Anniversary, Friendship, Events, Holidays & Vacationpack2 - Sliders: Families  -- For Anniversary, Events, Holidays & Vacationpack3 - Scenes: Spring & Summer Flowers  --  For Anniversary, Birthday, Friendship, Events & Vacation.pack4 - Scenes: Autumn & Winter  -- For Anniversary, Birthday, Friendship, Events & Vacation.pack5 - Scenes: Wild & Bright  -- For Anniversary, Birthday, Friendship, Events & Vacation.pack6 - Sliders: Birthday Animals  -- For Birthday & Events.pack7 - Scenes & Sliders: Graduation  -- For Eventspack8 - Scenes & Sliders: Halloween  -- For Holidayspack9 - Scenes & Sliders: Christmas -- For Holidayspack10 - Scenes & Sliders: Easter -- For Holidayspack11 - Scenes & Sliders: Thanksgiving -- For HolidaysIf you would like to be emailed when new ticker packages are added you can sign up to the Daisypath newsletter http://daisypath.com/newsletter.php

reviews.title: Just like the website!
reviews.comment: I like it where all the selections, tickers and etc are all same like the website version. So far, i satisfied with it. It look super nice when you put this widget on your phone screen. I just hope you can try to improve on the number of different tickers that can be put on the screen. Keep improving and updating! :)
reviews.author: Nursyue Ay

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: I cannot set it on my wallpaper , and that was the only reason i have bought it ... because i liked it on a wallpaper like shown on the image above. I want refund :) sorry.
reviews.author: Alina Cebula

reviews.title: Widgets need updated
reviews.comment: Honestly the widget sucks.. I want to be able to choose which is displayed not have every single tracker smashed into one stupid widget. Also it doesn\'t have to take up 6 spaces. The trackers are small enough there should be a two three and four option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Weight Loss Ticker!?
reviews.comment: The whole reason I paid $2 for this [otherwise pretty good] app was to have a weight loss ticker on my home screen. I love the site online because there are so many to choose from. That there is not even one on the app is very disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Centering & Very Small
reviews.comment: Cannot center, I agree with Diana very small.  Space was available to put on home screen but was automatically placed on screen with nothing else on it.  Screen froze directly after installing, what is up with that?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too small
reviews.comment: You get as many options as the free online version. It would be better if there were more backgrounds, but the selection is still nice. However, the widget really should be larger; it only comes in 3 x 2, so it looks cramped.
reviews.author: A Google User
